145027.<center>闘戦士 <cs_pchero>。\n汝が たどりし道を 今ここに:
<center>Fighting Warrior, <cs_pchero>. The path thou
hadst followed is now here to be reawakened.

145028.<center>恐れることなく どんな困難にも立ち向かう\n勇気の心。: <center>A courageous heart opposes whatever hardship without fear.

145029.<center>すべてを愛し 許す\n慈愛の心。: <center>A compassionate heart forgives and loves all.

145030.<center>物事を深く考え 真理に到達する\n英知の心。: <center>A comprehensive heart ponders things deeply to reach the truth.

145031.<center>どんな苦境に立たされても あきらめない\n希望の心。: <center>A caring heart never abandons hope no matter the situation.

145032.<center>４つの心を 糧として\n正義の心を 解き放て。: <center>Feed on those 4 virtues to release your righteous heart.
